Related Character(s): 哲
Связанный символ (и): 哲

悊字的基本解释

悊
zhé
敬重：“度周游鲁，鲁侯召而悊之。”
古同“哲”：“视之不明，是谓不悊。”
古同“折”，制。

悊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhé］
［《廣韻》陟列切，入薛，知。］
(1)敬。
(2)同“哲”。明智。
(3)通“折”。制。

悊字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　悊； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页386第38
【集韻】哲，古作悊。【前漢·?法志】聖人旣躬，明悊之性。【五行志】視之不明，是謂不悊。【韋孟·在鄒詩】赫赫天子，明悊且仁。又【漢書】引臯陶謨，知人則哲，亦作則，悊。蓋大篆从心，小篆从口。今文多作哲，隷用小篆也。

悊字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
悊字的起名意思

古同“哲”，也有敬重之义。

悊
Basic explanation of words
悊
zhé
Respect: "To travel around Lu, Lu Hou summoned it."
Gu Tong's "Zhe": "If you don't know it, you don't mean it's awkward."
Ancient with "folding", system.
悊
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhé］
["Guang Yun" Zhi column cut, enter Xue, know. ]
(1) Respect.
(2) Same as "Zhe". wise.
(3) Through "folding". system.
悊
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　悊; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 386 38
【Ji Yun】Zhe, ancient writing. [Former Han·? Fazhi] The saint bows and understands the nature of the sage. [Five Elements] To see unclearly means not to linger. 【Wei Meng·Zai Zou Poetry】He is the emperor, bright and benevolent. Also [Han Shu] cited Gao Tao Mo, knowing people is wise, but also precepts, 悊. Cover the big seal from the heart, and the small seal from the mouth. This article is more philosophical, and the official script is also a small seal.
